title: Great Basin National Park: Donate
body: Donate         Kathy Billings    If you wish to help Great Basin National Park fund its projects and operations, you can make a donation directly to the park. Your donation check should be made payable to DOI - National Park Service.   You can mail a check to: Superintendent Great Basin National Park 100 Great Basin National Park Baker, NV 89311 Your contribution supports resource management, education, visitor programs, and visitor protection throughout Great Basin National Park. One hundred percent of your donation goes directly to the park. For more information on direct donations and how they help Great Basin National Park, please contact Betsy Duncan-Clark at 775-234-7331 at park headquarters. Thank you for your contribution to Great Basin National Park!
